name: Ascendancy - KJam
description:
Created in under 72 hours for K-Jam 2020

Smash barrels and chests to get money and upgrade to win!

Chests are in different locations for each difficulty so make sure to explore!

More info: http://johnjoemcbob.com/portfolio/ascendancy/

Controls

WASD to move

Left mouse to attack

Space to jump

Created by

@johnjoemcbob - johnjoemcbob.com

Assets from

DUNGEON MASON - RPG Monster Duo PBR Polyart

COMEBACK - Stones and buried treasure

POLYGON BLACKSMITH - Toon RTS Units - Undead Demo

BROKEN VECTOR - Ultimate Low Poly Dungeon

JOSE (DOGZERX) DÍAZ - Medieval Cartoon Warriors

MISTER NECTURUS - Medieval Gold
